name: Maxi Priest
description: '''Max Alfred Elliott''' (born 10 June 1961), known by his stage name '''Maxi Priest''', is a British [[reggae]] vocalist of Jamaican descent. He is best known for singing reggae music with an [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]] influence, otherwise known as [[reggae fusion]]. He was one of the first international artists to have success in this genre, and one of the most successful reggae fusion acts of all time.
